title: ICDV 2024, Ha Noi, Vietnam
content: The 9th International Conference on Integrated Circuits, Design, and Verification (ICDV 2024)
body:
June 6-8, 2024 – Hanoi, Vietnam
Organized by IEEE CAS Vietnam Chapter;
co-Hosted by VNU Information Technology Institute & VNU International School

 The International Conference on Integrated Circuits, Design, and Verification (ICDV) provides a forum for exchanging ideas, discussing research results, and presenting chips, circuit designs and applications in solid-state and semiconductor fields. Continuous scaling of the CMOS devices increases the number of transistors on a VLSI chip. It reaches the level of 100 giga transistors on a single chip, which is comparatively higher than the total neuron numbers in the human brain. This would certainly provide us a great opportunity for new applications and information processing. On the other hands, the small feature size causes new problems such as leakage current and process variation. To discuss utilizing the scaling advantages and coping with the new problems, we call for contributions about new proposal of application systems, VLSI architectures, and design methodologies as well as the technologies and applications in the integrated circuits and devices field. We expect to this conference explores and stimulates the contributed researches to those subjects. The papers are solicited from prospective authors interested in the related fields.

The ICDV 2024 conference is organized by IEEE CAS Vietnam Chapter, co-hosted by VNU Information Technology Institute (VNU-ITI) and VNU International School (VNU-IS), technically supported by the IEEE SSCS Vietnam and the IEICE Vietnam Section. The ICDV 2024 will be held in Hanoi, Vietnam. Further information about the conference, paper submission guidelines and templates will be updated on the website. updated on the website.

 Prospective authors are invited to submit full-length, six-page manuscripts, including figures, tables and references, to the official ICDV 2024 website. All papers will be handled electronically. Accepted and presented papers will be included in the conference proceedings with ISBN and will be submitted for inclusion in IEEE Xplore® (the copyright shall be assigned to the IEEE). The proceedings of ICDV series are regularly indexed by Scopus and listed in conference proceeding citation index (CPCI) of Clarivate. Papers are solicited in the following categories, but are not limited to:

  1. Digital integrated circuits and signal processing
  2. Processors/ multiprocessors
  3. Memory design
  4. Analog and mixed-signal circuits
  5. RF integrated circuits and microwave engineering
  6. Circuit technologies
  7. Design experience with advanced design technologies
  8. Circuits/devices modeling, verification and testing
  9. Reconfigurable architectures & FPGA-based designs
  10. Embedded systems design
  11. AI & IoT related circuits, devices and applications
  12. Rebooting computing
  13. Hardware security, cryptography
  14. Industrial IoT devices and systems

Special Sessions
  • Signal Processing in Manufacturing Applications
  • Intelligent Control & AI

title: MAPR 2024, Da Nang, Vietnam
content: After the success of the 6th MAPR 2023, we are pleased to announce the 7th International Conference on Multimedia Analysis and Pattern Recognition (MAPR), supported by the Vietnamese Association on Pattern Recognition (VAPR). The conference will be held in Da Nang, Vietnam, on August 15-16, 2024.
body:

The conference will be held in Da Nang, Vietnam, on August 15-16, 2024. The aim of this conference is to bring together researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to share their latest research findings, experimental results, and foster potential collaborations in the areas of pattern recognition, multimedia analysis, and related fields. title: Hội thảo Quốc gia lần thứ XXVII - VNICT 2024
content: Hội thảo Quốc gia lần thứ XXVII "Một số vấn đề chọn lọc về Công nghệ thông tin và Truyền thông" (VNICT 2024) do Viện Công nghệ thông tin - Viện Hàn lâm Khoa học và Công nghệ Việt Nam và Trường Đại học Nha Trang đồng tổ chức tại Nha Trang-Khánh Hòa vào các ngày 11-12 tháng 10 năm 2024, và có sự tham gia phối hợp của Câu lạc bộ các Khoa-Trường-Viện CNTT-TT Việt Nam (FISU).
body:
Hội thảo Quốc gia lần thứ XXVII "Một số vấn đề chọn lọc về Công nghệ thông tin và Truyền thông" (VNICT 2024) do Viện Công nghệ thông tin - Viện Hàn lâm Khoa học và Công nghệ Việt Nam và Trường Đại học Nha Trang đồng tổ chức tại Nha Trang-Khánh Hòa vào các ngày 11-12 tháng 10 năm 2024, và có sự tham gia phối hợp của Câu lạc bộ các Khoa-Trường-Viện CNTT-TT Việt Nam (FISU). Hội thảo là diễn đàn thường niên để những người làm công tác nghiên cứu, triển khai, giảng dạy và quản lý trong lĩnh vực công nghệ thông tin và truyền thông trao đổi học thuật, chia sẻ kinh nghiệm ứng dụng và tìm kiếm sự hợp tác. Đặc biệt hội thảo khuyến khích các nhà khoa học trẻ, nghiên cứu sinh, học viên cao học tham gia báo cáo trao đổi kết quả nghiên cứu và học tập của mình. Hội thảo khuyến khích trưng bày giới thiệu các sản phẩm khoa học công nghệ và những kết quả nghiên cứu ứng dụng vào thực tiễn. Chủ đề chính của hội thảo năm nay: Khoa học dữ liệu và ứng dụng.

The International Conference on Advanced Technologies for Communications is an annual conference series, since 2008, co-organized by the Radio & Electronics Association of Vietnam (REV) and the IEEE Communications Society (IEEE ComSoc). The goal of the series is twofold: to foster an international forum for scientific and technological exchange among Vietnamese and worldwide scientists and engineers in the fields of electronics, communications and related areas, and to gather their high-quality research contributions.

In 2024, the ATC conference will be held in Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam during October 17-19 and hosted by Posts and Telecommunications Institute of Technology. The conference will feature prominent invited speakers as well as papers by top researchers from all over the world.

title: KSE 2024,  Eastin Hotel Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
content: The 16th IEEE International Conference on Knowledge and Systems Engineering (KSE 2024) will be held from 5 - 7 November 2024.
body:
The 16th International Conference on Knowledge and Systems Engineering (KSE 2024)
Eastin Hotel Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
5 - 7 November 2024 (Hybrid)

THEME:
Orchestrating Wisdom with Knowledge Engineering, Retrieval and Intelligence

BACKGROUND:
 The 16th IEEE International Conference on Knowledge and Systems Engineering (KSE 2024) will be held from 5 - 7 November 2024. The main objectives of the conference is to bring together researchers, practitioners, and students not only for the presentation, discussion, and exchange of state-of-the-art research and practical applications but also to foster collaboration in the fields. KSE 2024 this year will be held in Kuala Lumpur, the capital city of Malaysia, which is renowned for its multiculturalism with many cultural sites and activities.

KSE 2024 are co-organised by the Information Retrieval and Knowledge Management Society (Persatuan Capaian Maklumat dan Pengurusan Pengetahuan, PECAMP) Malaysia and the VNU University of Engineering and Technology (VNU-UET), endorsed by the Japan Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (JAIST), and technically co-sponsored by the IEEE Malaysia Section Chapter. These premier international conference, comprising three days of full paper presentations of new research findings and tutorials, welcome contributions in the fields of information retrieval, knowledge management, computational linguistics, knowledge and systems engineering, and related areas.

Accepted papers will be submitted to IEEE for inclusion in IEEE Xplore and other abstracting and indexing databases. Previous KSE and CAMP conference proceedings have been included in the IEEE Xplore Digital Library and Scopus databases. Selected papers have the potential to be invited to submit extended versions to be published in renowned journals.

OBJECTIVE:
  1. An opportunity to present and share research results, ideas and concepts for the mutual benefit of a variety of stakeholders
  2. Build networks and collaboration opportunities with fellow researchers in academia, industry practitioners and research scholars
  3. Publish research findings and conceptual ideas in journals and proceedings that have a significant impact on various stakeholders in dealing with the various current issues in the various fields of social sciences
  4. For students and researchers, this conference opportunity can provide added value to the research being conducted in terms of literature, methodology and research strategy and receive critical responses and feedback from experts in their respective fields.

CALL FOR PAPERS:
This premier international conference, comprising three days of full-paper presentations of new research findings and tutorials, welcomes contributions in the fields of information retrieval, knowledge management, computational linguistics, knowledge and systems engineering, and related areas. Accepted papers will be submitted to IEEE for inclusion in IEEE Xplore and other abstracting and indexing databases. The previous KSE conference proceedings have been included in the IEEE Xplore Digital Library and Scopus databases. IEEE reserves the right to exclude a paper from distribution after the conference (i.e., removal from IEEE Xplore) if the paper is not presented at the conference. High-quality papers presented at the conference will have the opportunity to be invited to submit extended versions to be published in an indexed journal.

Original papers on the following topics, but not limited to, are welcome to be submitted:

This is for IEEE Proceedings:
Authors are invited to submit manuscripts reporting original, unpublished research and recent developments and/or theoretical considerations. Paper submissions should be limited to a maximum of 6 pages in the IEEE 2-column format.

Please download and follow the guideline at IEEE website to write your manuscript: https://www.ieee.org/conferences/publishing/templates.html

Please submit your paper via online at http://submit.confbay.com/conf/kse2024

All submitted papers will be reviewed by the programme committee on the basis of technical quality, relevance, significance and clarity.

By submitting your paper to KSE 2024, you implicitly state that the paper is based on your own original research and that it has not and will not be submitted elsewhere. Please upload the PDF file of your manuscript through the link: http://submit.confbay.com/conf/kse2024

A special session proposal should include the title, aim and scope (including a list of the main topic) of the proposed session, and the names, e-mail addresses, affiliations, websites and short bios of the organizers. A list of potential contributors will be very helpful. Special session proposals will be evaluated based on the timeliness of the topic, its uniqueness, and qualifications of the proposers. The proposers are expected to have a good publication track record in the proposed area. Proposals of similar topics will be asked to merge or modify. Accepted special sessions will be listed on the website.

Proposals should be sent by e-mail to Special Session Chairs: Dr Vu Tran, Email: vutran@ism.ac.jp and cc secretariat.camp@gmail.com

All proposals should be submitted by June 15 2024. Early proposal submissions are encouraged.
